sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import '../styles/theme.css'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; function Dashboard() { const { user } = useAuth(); // Mock data for user balance and matches const userBalance = 1000.00; const upcomingMatches = [ { id: 1, player1: 'John Doe', player2: 'Jane Smith', date: '2024-03-20', time: '14:00', odds: { player1: 1.5, player2: 2.5 } }, { id: 2, player1: 'Mike Johnson', player2: 'Sarah Williams', date: '2024-03-21', time: '15:30', odds: { player1: 1.8, player2: 2.2 } }, { id: 3, player1: 'David Brown', player2: 'Emily Davis', date: '2024-03-22', time: '16:00', odds: { player1: 2.0, player2: 2.0 } }, ]; return (

Welcome, {user?.username}!

Active Bets

0

Won Bets

0

Total Points

0

Recent Activity

No recent activity

 {/* Balance Card */}
Available Balance

Rs {userBalance.toFixed(2)}

Add Funds
{/* Matches Section */}

Upcoming Matches

{upcomingMatches.map((match, index) => (
Match #{match.id}
{match.date} | {match.time}
{match.player1}
Odds: {match.odds.player1}
VS
{match.player2}
Odds: {match.odds.player2}
Place Bet
))}
); } export default Dashboard;
